content: crocheted drops easter egg and drops easter basket in muskat and glitter drops extra 0-500 egg materials drops muskat from garnstudio 50 g color no 30 vanilla 50 g color no 02 light blue 50 g color no 53 apple green 50 g color no 04 lilac 50 g color no 61 beige 50 g color no 05 light purple and use drops glitter from garnstudio 2 spools nr 01 gold drops crochet hook size 3 mm \ us c or the size needed to obtain 22 single_crochet x 24 rounds with 1 thread muskat and 2 threads glitter = 4 x 4 crochet in the round in stripes and colour combinations of your own choice with 1 thread muskat and 2 threads glitter uk version 1 items in the set egg basket 2 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3636&cid=19 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/0-500-easter-basket
